citations.narrative:
The disposition record for 5 domestic goat kids transferred on 07 July 2023 is missing the name and address of the
person to whom the animals were sold or given. No disposition record was found for 1 domestic goat kid transferred on 26
July 2023. Failure to report required information on records impedes USDA APHIS officials' ability to carry out their duties.
Every exhibitor shall make, keep and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose information concerning
animals which are transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of by the exhibitor. Information required on
disposition records includes the name and address of the person to whom an animal was sold or given, the date of sale or
disposal of the animal(s), the species of the animal(s), and the number of animals in the shipment.
Correct from this date forward of 27 November 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1)(iv) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The disposition record for 5 domestic goat kids transferred on 07 July 2023 is missing the name and address of the 
person to whom the animals were sold or given. No disposition record was found for 1 domestic goat kid transferred on 26 
July 2023. Failure to report required information on records impedes USDA APHIS officials' ability to carry out their duties. 
Every exhibitor shall make, keep and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose information concerning 
animals which are transported, sold, euthanized or otherwise disposed of by the exhibitor. Information required on 
disposition records includes the name and address of the person to whom an animal was sold or given, the date of sale or 
disposal of the animal(s), the species of the animal(s), and the number of animals in the shipment. 
 
Correct from this date forward of 27 November 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
